TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SystemColors extends System.Object
public ref class SystemColors abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Contains system colors, system brushes, and system resource keys that correspond to system display elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Text Usage You cannot declare this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], but you can use its static properties to assign values in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

Docs.summary: Gets the for the used to paint the active window's border.
Docs.value: The resource key for the used to paint the active window's border. This brush's property is , so it cannot be modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the to create a dynamic reference to the active border system brush. This dynamic reference will automatically update if the brush is changed. To create a static reference that does not update automatically, use . ## XAML Attribute Usage ```xaml
